meanings.definition: A person walking along a road or in a developed area.
meanings.sent1: Pedestrians should always use crosswalks to safely cross the street.
meanings.sent2: The city installed more sidewalks to accommodate the increasing number of pedestrians.
meanings.sent3: The pedestrians in the park were so focused on their phones that they almost walked into each other.
meanings.sent4: In the hustle and bustle of the city, pedestrians are like ants navigating the concrete jungle.
meanings.sent5: The sound of footsteps echoed through the tunnel as the pedestrians made their way home.

meanings.definition: A person traveling on foot; a walker.
meanings.sent1: The group of pedestrians enjoyed a leisurely stroll through the scenic countryside.
meanings.sent2: Pedestrians often stop to admire the view while hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The pedestrians in the marathon were determined to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the silhouette of the pedestrians walking along the beach was a peaceful sight.
meanings.sent5: The elderly man, a dedicated pedestrian, walked the same route every morning for exercise.
